release.info: This is an exciting new way to receive CopperheadOS updates and support! With this platform you can now purchase CopperheadOS through a reseller and utilize existing (bootloader unlockable) hardware without requiring the hardware being purchased from us.
In addition to being able to receive CopperheadOS without purchasing hardware, weâ€™re now able to provide CopperheadOS to customers from our resellers for a small activation and monthly fee.
